page.title: 16FARMING AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: In the area there is a mixture of arable and pastoral farming.The farms are quite small with a few employees , earning an average $90 week.Some own their farms of about 100 acres while others rent them from Warwickshire County Council.Fertilisers ,natural and manmade ,cost about $135 year.Equipment used includes tractors ploughs bailers and harvesters. Only some potatoes and vegetables are sold locally .Most popular crops include potatoes,grass,fodder,barley,and beet. There are dairy cows and dairy fallowers. They also have family pets, usually cats and dogs. Technology in the area is mainly in the home. Many people had a television video telephone and many kitchen gadgets. People use these for saving labour and speed.
